sql.trim: id, name, remark, status, account_name, account_open_bank, account_bank, account_no, service_fee_rate, additional_tax_rate, water_tax_rate, stamp_tax_rate, income_tax_rate, income_tax_type, create_time, update_time, registration_fee,park_provider_registration_fee,is_mini_app_show, value_added_tax_type,is_include_tax,include_tax_rate,value_added_tax_formula_id, additional_tax_formula_id,water_tax_formula_id,stamp_tax_formula_id,income_tax_formula_id, value_added_tax_rate

mapper.insert: insert into inv_park_provider(name, remark, status, account_name, account_open_bank, account_bank, account_no, service_fee_rate, additional_tax_rate, water_tax_rate, stamp_tax_rate, income_tax_rate, income_tax_type, create_time, update_time,registration_fee,park_provider_registration_fee,is_mini_app_show, value_added_tax_formula_id,additional_tax_formula_id,water_tax_formula_id,stamp_tax_formula_id, income_tax_formula_id,value_added_tax_rate,value_added_tax_type,is_include_tax,include_tax_rate) VALUES (#{name}, #{remark}, #{status}, #{accountName}, #{accountOpenBank}, #{accountBank}, #{accountNo}, #{serviceFeeRate}, #{additionalTaxRate}, #{waterTaxRate}, #{stampTaxRate}, #{incomeTaxRate}, #{incomeTaxType}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime},#{registrationFee},#{parkProviderRegistrationFee},#{isMiniAppShow}, #{valueAddedTaxFormulaId},#{additionalTaxFormulaId},#{waterTaxFormulaId},#{stampTaxFormulaId}, #{incomeTaxFormulaId},#{valueAddedTaxRate},#{valueAddedTaxType},#{isIncludeTax},#{includeTaxRate})
mapper.update: update inv_park_provider set name = #{name}, remark = #{remark}, account_name = #{accountName}, account_open_bank = #{accountOpenBank}, account_bank = #{accountBank}, account_no = #{accountNo}, service_fee_rate = #{serviceFeeRate}, additional_tax_rate = #{additionalTaxRate}, water_tax_rate = #{waterTaxRate}, stamp_tax_rate = #{stampTaxRate}, income_tax_rate = #{incomeTaxRate}, income_tax_type = #{incomeTaxType}, update_time = #{updateTime}, is_mini_app_show = #{isMiniAppShow}, registration_fee = #{registrationFee}, park_provider_registration_fee = #{parkProviderRegistrationFee}, value_added_tax_type = #{valueAddedTaxType}, value_added_tax_formula_id = #{valueAddedTaxFormulaId}, additional_tax_formula_id = #{additionalTaxFormulaId}, water_tax_formula_id = #{waterTaxFormulaId}, stamp_tax_formula_id = #{stampTaxFormulaId}, income_tax_formula_id = #{incomeTaxFormulaId}, value_added_tax_rate = #{valueAddedTaxRate}, is_include_tax =#{isIncludeTax}, include_tax_rate =#{includeTaxRate} where id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select id,name,remark,status,create_time from inv_park_provider
name like concat ('%',#{name},'%')
order by status asc ,create_time desc

select id, name, remark, status, account_name, account_open_bank, account_bank, account_no, service_fee_rate, additional_tax_rate, water_tax_rate, stamp_tax_rate, income_tax_rate, value_added_tax_rate, income_tax_type, create_time, registration_fee, park_provider_registration_fee, is_mini_app_show, value_added_tax_type, value_added_tax_formula_id, additional_tax_formula_id, water_tax_formula_id, stamp_tax_formula_id, income_tax_formula_id, is_include_tax, include_tax_rate from inv_park_provider where id = #{id}
